name: Bubble Trouble (itch) (Tanner Cobb)
description:
Bubble Trouble is a game where you play as a small crab at the bottom of the sea, where you must use your claws to bounce bubbles at your enemies. Help defend this little crab and defeat countless enemies along the way!

Features
  • 4 Unique Enemies
  • 1 Boss Enemy
  • 4 Unique Power-Ups
  • Responsive Tilt Controls
  • Progressive Wave System
Gameplay

Bubble Trouble is all about bouncing bubbles towards your enemies and dealing massive damage with power-ups. Bubbles will spawn on your left and right at set intervals, click on different sides of the screen to hit left or right.

Waves

During a level there will be a set number of waves which will slowly increase in difficulty indicated by the color of the banner. The next wave will begin regardless if all enemies have been defeated or not, so make sure to keep up the pace or you will be quickly overwhelmed. Each enemy will contain there own set of unique attacks that the player must dodge during the wave. Complete all of the normal waves and reach the boss round where you will fight one of the terrors of the deep which all contain there own special attacks and massive health bars. Complete the boss round to survive the waves and complete the level.
